name: Bus Simulator Transport Master
description:
Bus Simulator Transport Master is an exciting and dynamic bus driving simulator. The detailed buses, and consequently the beautiful urban environment of the bus driving simulator will make you want to drive a real city bus simulator.

With passengers on board, you take on the responsibility of getting safely to your destination in a set amount of time.

With many levels from easy to difficult, from slow to high speed, this simulation game will teach you how to be a real driver without any risk. Try to pass them all.

Unique features:
- Urban environment with stunning 3D graphics;
- Smooth and realistic control of the bus;
- Stunning musical accompaniment;
- 12 levels with tour buses;
- Enjoy our bus simulator games;
- Animated modern city passengers;
- Pick up and drop off passengers at their stations.
